content.title: Safe, enjoyable vacations - discover our vacation ideas

content.textLeft:
Be inspired by our ideas for your vacation home and discover the perfect vacation home or the ideal vacation apartment for your wishes: simply take a vacation without compromise, with more space and freedom than in a hotel.

The Interhome offer covers all personal wishes and needs. You have the choice between a spacious vacation home with pool, a villa by the sea, a cozy chalet in the mountains, a detached vacation home as an ideal retreat in nature or a practical vacation apartment directly in the city center.

Here you will certainly find the right inspiration for your next vacation.
content.textRight:
That is why a vacation in a vacation home or apartment is just the right choice for you:

Vacations in a vacation home stand for freedom and independence, beginning with your individual arrival in your own car.

Be your own boss and enjoy your privacy, undisturbed.

You don’t have to share your accommodation and have the option to cater for yourself.

Design your own vacation without missing all the comfort, quality and security of home.

Relax on your vacation: you are in good hands. Make the most of personal assistance and a safe, yet hassle-free, hand-over of the key

>> That's how safe you are in your vacation home! Find out more here

content.title: Vacation near your own country - relaxation in no time

content.text:
Short and uncomplicated journey as well as familiar language: You will have all the more time and vacation budget to really enjoy your vacation in the USA. It is also worthwhile to break out of everyday life for just a short time, with Interhome short stays are possible from just a few nights. It's also worth taking a look at our last minute offers, or, if you are planning for a longer period of time, at vacation accommodations with an early booking discount.

So now it is time to get away from your everyday life and discover the most beautiful regions near your own country in your vacation home or apartment!

elements.title: Why Interhome
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
